summary: This mod allows you to cancel melee attacks by pressing the Ready/Sheathe button.
descriptionHtml:
Attack Cancel
by Tiny Lampe
version: 1.0 (first release) 
Requirements: Skyrim version 1.8.151.0.7 or higher 
***************************************************************

Overview: 
************
This mod allows you to cancel melee attacks by pressing the Ready/Sheathe button. Essentially, this is exactly what you do to denock an arrow. I simply extended this existing functionality to melee weapons. 

Details: 
*********
Both normal attacks and power attacks can be cancelled but ONLY when you\'re starting them. You cannot cancel an attack mid-swing! 
This mod works with any melee weapon, 1H or 2H, vanilla or from other mods
This mod works both in First Person and Third Person 

Installation and Uninstallation: 
*************************************
This mod consists only of 1 file: AttackCancel.esp
To install, drop the .esp file inside your data folder and check it in the launcher
To uninstall uncheck the mod in the launcher and then remove the .esp file from your data folder

Compatibility & other useful info
****************************************
This mod is compatible with any other mods, combat mods included
This mod does NOT use scripts at all so it is perfectly save to uninstall
This mod does NOT have any performance hit
This mod is clean according to TES5Edit 

Known Issues: 
****************
None that I\'m aware of.
author: Tiny Lampe
